nodes.text: D'Nile was a planet in the D'Nile system.

The addition of D'Nile to The Holocron by Leland Chee, appears to be the result of a misinterpretation of a quote made by George Lucas at Celebration V on August 14, 2010. Skywalker wine, mentioned by Lucas at this event, was also added to The Holocron following the event. With the planet's addition to the Holocron, The Essential Atlas Online Companion introduced the D'Nile system. Jason Fry later confirmed from a provided list of systems, which included the D'Nile system, that D'Nile was an established world.
